features.name: Project & Quest Management
features.description: Register projects, create and manage multi-step quests, and manage tasks (social, download, form, visit, learn/quiz).

features.name: Authentication (Wallet, Email, Social)
features.description: Secure authentication via wallet (EVM/Solana), email, and OAuth (Twitter/X, Discord, Telegram).

features.name: XP & Leaderboard System
features.description: Earn XP for completing quests, view global and quest-specific leaderboards.

features.name: Real-Time Social Verification
features.description: Automatic verification for social actions (follow, join, like, retweet, subscribe) using X/Twitter, Discord, Telegram APIs.

features.name: Responsive UI & Theming
features.description: Mobile-first, accessible, and consistent design using Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI, and Radix UI.

features.name: User Dashboard & Profile Management
features.description: Track active/completed quests, badges, achievements, edit profile, link/unlink social accounts, manage wallet/email.

features.name: Testing & Validation
features.description: Unit tests for components using Jest and React Testing Library. Schema validation with Zod.

features.name: API & Database Integration
features.description: API routes for authentication, project, quest, and verification logic. Database schema and migration scripts.
